source.sqlReaderQuery:
Select distinct
	rh.RatingHeaderID,
	RatingReferenceNumber,
	rh.PremiseTypeID,
	premiseType.ClassName as PremiseType,
	rh.PremiseID,
	premise.PremiseName as PremiseName,
	AssessorID,
	rc.email as AssessorEmail,
	customer.RegisteredName as Customer_Name, 
	customer.TradingName as Customer_TradingName,
	cmaddr.[StreetNumber] as [Customer_Mailing_StreetNumber],
    cmaddr.[StreetName]  as [Customer_Mailing_StreetName],
    cmaddr.[Suburb] as [Customer_Mailing_Suburb],
    cmaddr.[Postcode] as [Customer_Mailing_Postcode],
	cmst.ClassName as [Customer_Mailing_State],
	customer.ABN as [Customer_ABN],
	customer.customerid as [customer_id],
	corg.ClassName as [Customer_Organisation],
	customer.SAPNumber as Customer_SAP_Number,

	RatingPeriodFrom,
	RatingPeriodTo,
	PublicListingFlag,
	OfficerID,
	RatingStatusID,
	rs.ClassName as RatingStatus,
	LodgedDate,
	PaymentStatusID,
	ps.ClassName as PaymentStatus,
	PaidDate,
	--Certificate
	CertificateValidFrom,
	CertificateValidTo,

	PremisesName as PremiseNameOnCert,
	CustomerName as CustomerNameOnCert,

	rh.DeliveryEmail  as Certificate_Customer_Email,

	LastActionDate, 

	ReplaceFlag,
	RenewFlag,
	PreviousRatingHeaderID,
	NewRatingHeaderID,
	addr.[StreetNumber],
    addr.[StreetName],
    addr.[Suburb],
    addr.[Postcode],
	st.ClassName as [State],
	(select  stuff(list,1,1,'')
		from  (( Select ';' + cast(crt.ClassName as varchar(16)) FROM tblRatingType rt 
					INNER JOIN tblClassification crt on crt.ClassificationID = rt.RatingType
					and rt.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID
					for     xml path(''))) as Sub(list)) as RatingTypes



	, scs.CinemaTheatres 
	, scws.ShoppingCentreWaterSummaryID 
	, scs.FloorConfiguration
	, scs.ParkingSpacesMechanical
	, scs.ParkingSpacesNatural 
	, scs.TotalGymGLAR 
	, scs.FoodCourtSeats 
	, rad.conflictOfInterestFlag 
	, Case when coalesce(rad.InComplianceWithCurrentRules , '') = '' then 0 else rad.InComplianceWithCurrentRules end as InComplianceWithCurrentRules 
	, (Select top 1 wsrcl.classname from tblRatingType wsr left join tblClassification wsrcl on wsrcl.ClassificationID = wsr.StarRatingWithGreenPowerID and wsr.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID and wsr.RatingType = 57) as WaterStarRatingWRecycle
	, (Select top 1 wsrcl.classname from tblRatingType wsr left join tblClassification wsrcl on wsrcl.ClassificationID = wsr.StarRatingWithoutGreenPowerID and wsr.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID and wsr.RatingType = 57) as WaterStarRatingWoRecycle
	, (Select top 1 wsrcl.classname from tblRatingType wsr left join tblClassification wsrcl on wsrcl.ClassificationID = wsr.StarRatingWithGreenPowerID and wsr.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID and wsr.RatingType = 56) as EnergyStarRatingWRecycle
	, (Select top 1 wsrcl.classname from tblRatingType wsr left join tblClassification wsrcl on wsrcl.ClassificationID = wsr.StarRatingWithoutGreenPowerID and wsr.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID and wsr.RatingType = 56) as EnergyStarRatingWoRecycle
	, isnull(sces.TotalElectricityUse * 3.6, 0) + isnull(sces.TotalGasUse, 0) + isnull(sces.TotalLPGUse * 25.7, 0) + isnull(sces.TotalOilUse * 38.6, 0) + isnull(sces.TotalCoalUse * 22.1, 0) as totalEnergyConsumption
	, scs.HoursOfService as WeeklyCoreHoursOfService 
	, sces.TotalElectricityUse as TotalElectricityConsumption
	, sces.TotalOilUse as TotalDieselConsumption
	, scws.WaterConsumptionWoRW as WaterConsumption
	, scws.WaterUsePerSqmWoRW as RecycleNormalisedWaterConsumption
	, scws.WaterConsumptionWoRW as TotalWaterConsumption
	, scws.RecycledWaterPercent as TotalRecycledWaterPercent
	, sces.TotalGasUse as TotalGasConsumption
	, (select top 1 Amount from tblFinancialTransaction ft inner join tblRatingPayment rp on ft.RatingPaymentID = rp.RatingPaymentID
			and rp.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderId
			where FeeCategoryID = 244 -- Loedgement
			) as RatingLodgementFees
	, sces.PredictedGHGEmissionsPerSqm as PredictedGreenhouseGasIntensity
	, scws.PredictedWaterUsePerGLAR as PredictedAverageWaterUse
	, scs.TradingDays as NumberOfTradingDays
	, scws.PredictedWaterUsePerGLARWoRW as NoRecyclePredictedAverageWaterUse
	, sces.GHGEmissionsPerSqmGLARScope12WoGP as NoGreenPower_GHG_IntensityScope_12
	, sces.GHGEmissionsPerSqmGLARScope123WoGP as NoGreenPowerGHGIntensityScope123
	, sces.GHGEmissionsScope12WoGP as NoGreenPowerGHGEmissionsScope12
	, sces.GHGEmissionsScope123WoGP  as NoGreenPowerGHGEmissionsScope123
	, sces.GHGEmissionsPerSqmGLARScope123 as GreenhouseGasIntensityScope123
	, sces.GHGEmissionsScope123  as GreenhouseGasEmissionsScope123
	, sces.EnergyIntensity
	, rad.ComplianceExplanation as ExplainWhyNotCompliant 
	, scs.IsSmallShoppingCentre
	, @{pipeline().parameters.pBatchId} as batch_id
	
from tblRatingHeader rh
left join tblPremise premise on premise.PremiseID = rh.PremiseID
left join tblClassification premiseType on premiseType.ClassificationID = rh.PremiseTypeID
left join tblClassification rs on rs.ClassificationID = rh.RatingStatusID
left join tblClassification ps on ps.ClassificationID = rh.PaymentStatusID
left join tblAdministrator ad on ad.AdministratorID = rh.OfficerID
left join tblUser aduser on aduser.UserID = ad.UserID
left join tblCustomer customer on customer.CustomerID = rh.CustomerID
left join tblRatingContractor rc on rc.RatingContractorID = rh.AssessorID
left join tblUser rcuser on rcuser.UserID = rc.UserID
left join tblAddress addr on addr.AddressId = premise.PremiseAddressId
left join tblClassification st on st.ClassificationID = addr.StateId
left join tblAddress cmaddr on cmaddr.AddressId = customer.MailingAddressID
left join tblClassification cmst on cmst.ClassificationID = cmaddr.StateId

left join tblShoppingCentreSummary scs on scs.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID
left join tblShoppingCentreEnergySummary sces on sces.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID
left join tblShoppingCentreWaterSummary scws on scws.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID

left join tblAssessorDeclaration rad on rad.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID

left join tblClassification corg on corg.ClassificationID = customer.OrganisationTypeID

Where rh.PremiseTypeID = 55
and RatingStatusID in (157,158)			
and rh.RatingHeaderID in (@{pipeline().parameters.pDeltaRatingHeaderIds})
order by RatingHeaderID

sqlReaderQuery.value:
Select 
	distinct 
	rh.RatingHeaderID,
	rcc.companyid,
	rc.RatingContractorID as AssessorId,
	rcuser.UserID as UserId,
	rcuser.FirstName, 
	rcuser.LastName, 
	tc.ClassName as Title, 
	maddr.[StreetNumber] as Mailing_StreetNumber,
    maddr.[StreetName] as Mailing_StreetName,
    maddr.[Suburb] as Mailing_Suburb,
    maddr.[Postcode] as Mailing_Postcode,
	mst.ClassName as Mailing_State,

	baddr.[StreetNumber] as Billing_StreetNumber,
    baddr.[StreetName] as Billing_StreetName,
    baddr.[Suburb] as Billing_Suburb,
    baddr.[Postcode] as Billing_Postcode,
	bst.ClassName as Billing_State,
	Phone,
	Mobile,
	Email,
	JoinedDate,
	AccreditationDate,
	AccreditationExpiryDate,
	AccreditationNumber,
	EnergyFlag, 
	WaterFlag, 
	WasteFlag
	, @{pipeline().parameters.pBatchId} as batch_id
	, RequireSupervisionSC
	, (select  stuff(list,1,1,'')
		from  (( Select ';' + cast(crst.ClassCode as varchar(16)) FROM PVBMSDB4202.nabersdb.dbo.tblRatingContractorAvailability  rca 
					INNER JOIN PVBMSDB4202.nabersdb.dbo.tblClassification crt on crt.ClassificationID = rca.AvailabilityTypeID
					left join PVBMSDB4202.nabersdb.dbo.tblClassification crst on crst.ClassificationID = rca.StateId
					and rca.RatingContractorID = rc.RatingContractorID and crt.ClassificationID = 459
					for     xml path(''))) as Sub(list)) as Metropolitan
	, (select  stuff(list,1,1,'')
		from  (( Select ';' + cast(crst.ClassCode as varchar(16)) FROM PVBMSDB4202.nabersdb.dbo.tblRatingContractorAvailability  rca 
					INNER JOIN PVBMSDB4202.nabersdb.dbo.tblClassification crt on crt.ClassificationID = rca.AvailabilityTypeID
					left join PVBMSDB4202.nabersdb.dbo.tblClassification crst on crst.ClassificationID = rca.StateId
					and rca.RatingContractorID = rc.RatingContractorID and crt.ClassificationID = 460
					for     xml path(''))) as Sub(list)) as Regional
	, case when RetailFlag is null then 0 else RetailFlag end as RetailFlag 
	, case when HospitalFlag is null then 0 else HospitalFlag end as HospitalFlag 
	, case when HotelFlag is null then 0 else HotelFlag end as HotelFlag 
	, case when OfficeFlag is null then 0 else OfficeFlag end as OfficeFlag 
	, case when ApartmentBuildingFlag is null then 0 else ApartmentBuildingFlag end as ApartmentBuildingFlag 
	
	--into AssessorsStage
	from 
		PVBMSDB4202.nabersdb.dbo.tblRatingHeader rh
		left join PVBMSDB4202.nabersdb.dbo.tblRatingContractor rc on rc.RatingContractorID = rh.AssessorID
		left join PVBMSDB4202.nabersdb.dbo.tblUser rcuser on rcuser.UserID = rc.UserID
		left join PVBMSDB4202.nabersdb.dbo.tblClassification tc on tc.ClassificationID = TitleID
		left join PVBMSDB4202.nabersdb.dbo.tblAddress maddr on maddr.AddressId = MailingAddressID
		left join PVBMSDB4202.nabersdb.dbo.tblAddress baddr on baddr.AddressId = BillingAddressID
		left join PVBMSDB4202.nabersdb.dbo.tblClassification mst on mst.ClassificationID = maddr.StateId
		left join PVBMSDB4202.nabersdb.dbo.tblClassification bst on bst.ClassificationID = baddr.StateId
		inner join PVBMSDB4202.nabersdb.dbo.tblRatingContractorCompany rcc on rc.RatingContractorID = rcc.assessorid
		
	Where rh.PremiseTypeID = 55 and 
	(EndEffectiveDate is null or EndEffectiveDate > getdate())
	and RatingStatusID in (157,158)			
 and rh.RatingHeaderId in (@{pipeline().parameters.pDeltaRatingHeaderIds})
	order by RatingHeaderID

select 
	distinct 
	rh.RatingHeaderID,
	c.ABN, c.CompanyName, c.CompanyID, c.CompanyStatusID,
	c.CompanyTypeID, c.CompanyURL, c.MailingAddressID, c.Phone, 
	c.PIInsuranceExpiryDate, c.PLInsuranceExpiryDate, c.RatingParticipationFlag,
	c.SAPCustomerNo, c.ShortName, c.SoleTraderFlag,
	maddr.[StreetNumber] as Mailing_StreetNumber,
    maddr.[StreetName] as Mailing_StreetName,
    maddr.[Suburb] as Mailing_Suburb,
    maddr.[Postcode] as Mailing_Postcode,
	mst.ClassName as Mailing_State,

	baddr.[StreetNumber] as Billing_StreetNumber,
    baddr.[StreetName] as Billing_StreetName,
    baddr.[Suburb] as Billing_Suburb,
    baddr.[Postcode] as Billing_Postcode,
	bst.ClassName as Billing_State,
	'Assessor' as Type
	, @{pipeline().parameters.pBatchId} as batch_id
--into CompanyStage
from  
	PVBMSDB4202.nabersdb.dbo.tblRatingHeader rh
	left join PVBMSDB4202.nabersdb.dbo.tblRatingContractor rc on rc.RatingContractorID = rh.AssessorID
	inner join PVBMSDB4202.nabersdb.dbo.tblRatingContractorCompany rcc on rc.RatingContractorID = rcc.assessorid
	inner join PVBMSDB4202.nabersdb.dbo.tblCompany c on c.companyid = rcc.companyid
	left join PVBMSDB4202.nabersdb.dbo.tblAddress maddr on maddr.AddressId = c.MailingAddressID
	left join PVBMSDB4202.nabersdb.dbo.tblAddress baddr on baddr.AddressId = c.BillingAddressID
	left join PVBMSDB4202.nabersdb.dbo.tblClassification mst on mst.ClassificationID = maddr.StateId
	left join PVBMSDB4202.nabersdb.dbo.tblClassification bst on bst.ClassificationID = baddr.StateId
Where rh.PremiseTypeID = 55 
	and (EndEffectiveDate is null or EndEffectiveDate > getdate())
	and RatingStatusID in (157,158)			--Certified Current/Expired

and rh.RatingHeaderId In (@{pipeline().parameters.pDeltaRatingHeaderIds})

order by RatingHeaderID

Select distinct 
		rh.RatingHeaderID
		, a.AdministratorID
		, u.FirstName 
		, u.LastName  
		, ag.FullName 
		, a.JobTitle
		, a.Phone
		, a.Mobile
		, a.Fax
		, a.Email
		, oc1.ClassName as OtherContactType1
		, a.OtherContact1
		, oc2.ClassName as OtherContactType2
		, a.OtherContact2
		, a.ProgramManagerFlag
		, a.AccountManagerFlag
		, a.SystemAdministratorFlag
		, a.AssessorCustomerFlag
		, a.RatingFlag
		, a.AuditFlag
		, a.TrainingFlag
		, a.CAFlag
		, a.EnquiryFlag
		, a.PaymentFlag
		, a.PrintFlag
		, a.ResourceFlag
		, a.PublisherFlag
		, a.JoinedDate
		, @{pipeline().parameters.pBatchId} as batch_id
--into TechOfficersStage
from PVBMSDB4202.nabersdb.dbo.tblAdministrator a 
	inner join PVBMSDB4202.nabersdb.dbo.tblRatingHeader rh on rh.OfficerID = a.AdministratorID
	inner join PVBMSDB4202.nabersdb.dbo.tblAgency ag on ag.AgencyID = a.AgencyID
	inner join PVBMSDB4202.nabersdb.dbo.tblUser u on u.UserID  = a.UserID
	left join PVBMSDB4202.nabersdb.dbo.tblClassification oc1 on oc1.ClassificationID = a.OtherContactTypeID1
	left join PVBMSDB4202.nabersdb.dbo.tblClassification oc2 on oc2.ClassificationID = a.OtherContactTypeID2
where PremiseTypeID = 55
and RatingStatusID in (157,158)			--Certified Current/Expired

and rh.ratingheaderid in (@{pipeline().parameters.pDeltaRatingHeaderIds})

order by RatingHeaderID

Select distinct 
	rh.CustomerID, 
	rcc.RatingHeaderID, 
	cc.CustomerContactID,
	cc.ContactID,
	c.Position, 
	rt.ClassName as RoleType,
	addr.[StreetNumber] as StreetNumber,
    addr.[StreetName] as StreetName,
    addr.[Suburb] as Suburb,
    addr.[Postcode] as Postcode,
	mst.ClassName as [State]

	, c.phone, c.Mobile, c.fax, 

c.Email, c.AccountManagerFlag, c.ManageRatingFlag, c.ViewRatingFlag, c.ManageCAFlag, c.ViewCAFlag, 

u.FirstName, u.LastName, tc.ClassName as Title, u.LoginName

, @{pipeline().parameters.pBatchId} as batch_id
--into CustomerContactStage
from PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingHeader rh
inner join PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblCustomerContact cc on cc.CustomerID = rh.CustomerID
inner join PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblContact c on c.ContactId = cc.ContactId
LEFT join PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingCustomerContact rcc on rcc.ratingheaderid = rh.ratingheaderid
			and rcc.CustomerContactID = cc.CustomerContactID
inner join PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblUser u on u.UserID = c.UserID
		left join PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblClassification tc on tc.ClassificationID = TitleID
		left join PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblAddress addr on addr.AddressId = c.AddressID		
		left join PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblClassification mst on mst.ClassificationID = addr.StateId
		left join PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblClassification rt on rt.ClassificationID = c.RoleTypeID

Where rh.PremiseTypeID = 55
and rh.RatingStatusID in (157,158)			--Certified Current/Expired
and rh.RatingHeaderId In (@{pipeline().parameters.pDeltaRatingHeaderIds})


order by RatingHeaderID

--HoursOfServicesStage
SELECT
       rh.RatingHeaderID

	   	,lapsa.d.value('(@AreaID)[1]', 'float') AS AreaID
		,lapsa.d.value('TenancyName[1]', 'varchar(max)') AS TenancyName
		,lapsa.d.value('ListedArea[1]', 'varchar(max)') AS ListedArea
		,lova.blocknumber
		,case when lova.IsListedAsCentralServiced = 'no' then 0 else 1 end as IsListedAsCentralServiced
		,case when lova.TenancyServicingCheck = 'SVC' then 1 else 0 end as IsTenancyServicingCheck
			

		,case when nomo.IsAreaConfirmed = 'true' then 1 else 0 end as IsAreaConfirmed
		,case when nomo.IsCentralServicingResult = 'yes' then 1 else 0 end as IsCentralServicingResult
		,nomo.RatedCSArea
		,nomo.RatedGLAR
		,nomo.WeeksVacant

		, case when homo.ExtentedHours = 'true' then 1 else 0 end as ExtentedHours
		, homo.ExtentedHours
		, homo.Hours
		, homo.HoursArea
		, homo.IsExtendedHoursEnabled
		, homo.IsHoursEnabled


		, zomo.CoreHours
		, @{pipeline().parameters.pBatchId} as batch_id

	--into HoursOfServicesStage
FROM PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingData rd
	INNER JOIN PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingHeader rh ON rd.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID
	OUTER APPLY rd.RatingDataXML.nodes('//NabersData/GeneralEnvelope/GeneralSinglePages/ListedAreaPage') lap(t)
	OUTER APPLY rd.RatingDataXML.nodes('//NabersData/GeneralEnvelope/GeneralSinglePages/ListedAreaPage/AreaTable/ShopArea')  lapsa(d)
    OUTER APPLY rd.RatingDataXML.nodes('//NabersData/GeneralEnvelope/GeneralSinglePages/ListedAreaPage/AreaTable')  lapat(d)
	
	left Join (Select rd.RatingDataID, 
					ca.d.value('(@AreaID)[1]', 'float') AS AreaID
					,ca.d.value('BlockNumber[1]', 'float') AS BlockNumber
					,ca.d.value('IsListedAsCentralServiced[1]', 'varchar(10)') as IsListedAsCentralServiced
					,ca.d.value('(TenancyServicingCheck/@Value)[1]', 'varchar(10)') AS TenancyServicingCheck
				From PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingData rd 
						OUTER APPLY rd.RatingDataXML.nodes('//NabersData/GeneralEnvelope/GeneralSinglePages/CentralServicePage/CentralSvcTable/CentralServicedArea')  ca(d)) as lova 
		on lova.AreaID = lapsa.d.value('(@AreaID)[1]', 'float') and rd.RatingDataID = lova.RatingDataID

	left Join (Select rd.RatingDataID, 
					ca.d.value('(@AreaID)[1]', 'float') AS AreaID
					,ca.d.value('WeeksVacant[1]', 'float') AS WeeksVacant
					,ca.d.value('RatedGLAR[1]', 'float') as RatedGLAR
					,ca.d.value('RatedCSArea[1]', 'float') AS RatedCSArea
					,ca.d.value('(AreaConfirmed/@xsi:nil)[1]', 'varchar(10)') AS IsAreaConfirmed
					,ca.d.value('(CentralServicingResult/@Value)[1]', 'varchar(10)') AS IsCentralServicingResult		
				From PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingData rd 
					OUTER APPLY rd.RatingDataXML.nodes('//NabersData/GeneralEnvelope/GeneralSinglePages/ConfirmedAreaPage/ConfirmedAreaTable/ConfirmedArea')  ca(d)) as nomo 
			on nomo.AreaID = lapsa.d.value('(@AreaID)[1]', 'float') and rd.RatingDataID = nomo.RatingDataID
   
	left Join (Select rd.RatingDataID
					--,xa.d.value('CoreHours[1]', 'float') AS CoreHours
					,ca.d.value('(@AreaID)[1]', 'float') AS AreaID
					,ca.d.value('ExtentedHours[1]', 'varchar(10)') AS ExtentedHours
					,ca.d.value('IsExtendedHoursEnabled[1]', 'varchar(10)') as IsExtendedHoursEnabled
					,ca.d.value('IsHoursEnabled[1]', 'varchar(10)') AS IsHoursEnabled
					,ca.d.value('Hours[1]', 'float') AS Hours
					,ca.d.value('HoursArea[1]', 'float') AS HoursArea		
				From PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingData rd 
					OUTER APPLY rd.RatingDataXML.nodes('//NabersData/GeneralEnvelope/GeneralSinglePages/HoursofServicePage/HoursofServiceTable/HoursofService')  ca(d)) as homo 
			on homo.AreaID = lapsa.d.value('(@AreaID)[1]', 'float') and rd.RatingDataID = homo.RatingDataID

	left Join (Select rd.RatingDataID
					,ca.d.value('CoreHours[1]', 'float') AS CoreHours
				From PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingData rd 
					OUTER APPLY rd.RatingDataXML.nodes('//NabersData/GeneralEnvelope/GeneralSinglePages/HoursofServicePage')  ca(d)) as zomo 
			on rd.RatingDataID = zomo.RatingDataID



WHERE rh.PremiseTypeID = 55 
and rh.RatingStatusID in (157,158)			--Certified Current/Expired
and rh.ratingHeaderId in (@{pipeline().parameters.pDeltaRatingHeaderIds})

order by RatingHeaderID, AreaID

SELECT
       rh.RatingHeaderID
     
	   	,ps.d.value('(@BlockID)[1]', 'float') AS BlockID
		,ps.d.value('BlockDesc[1]', 'varchar(max)') AS BlockDesc
		,ps.d.value('(VentilationType/@Value)[1]', 'varchar(20)') AS VentilationType
		,ps.d.value('NumberParkingSpaces[1]', 'float') AS NumberParkingSpaces
		,ps.d.value('NumberOutOfSvcGT4Weeks[1]', 'float') AS NumberOutOfSvcGT4Weeks
		,ps.d.value('OutOfServiceWeeks[1]', 'float') AS OutOfServiceWeeks
		,ps.d.value('SpacesNatural[1]', 'float') AS SpacesNatural
		,ps.d.value('SpacesMechanical[1]', 'float') AS SpacesMechanical	
		, @{pipeline().parameters.pBatchId} as batch_id

	--into ParkingSpaceStage
FROM PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingData rd
	INNER JOIN PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingHeader rh ON rd.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID
	OUTER APPLY rd.RatingDataXML.nodes('//NabersData/GeneralEnvelope/GeneralSinglePages/ParkingPage/ParkingSpaces/ParkingBlock') ps(d)

	
WHERE rh.PremiseTypeID = 55 
and rh.RatingStatusID in (157,158)			--Certified Current/Expired

and rh.RatingheaderId in (@{pipeline().parameters.pDeltaRatingHeaderIds})
order by RatingHeaderID, BlockID

Select * from (
SELECT
       rh.RatingHeaderID
      
	   --AreaTable
	   --ShopArea
	   	,ps.d.value('(@FoodCrtID)[1]', 'float') AS FoodCourtID
		,ps.d.value('FoodCrtDesc[1]', 'varchar(max)') AS FoodCourtDesc
		,ps.d.value('NumberSeats[1]', 'float') AS NumberSeats
		,ps.d.value('NumberSeatsOutOfSvcGT4Weeks[1]', 'float') AS NumberSeatsOutOfSvcGT4Weeks
		,ps.d.value('OutOfServiceWeeks[1]', 'float') AS OutOfServiceWeeks
		,ps.d.value('RatedNumberSeats[1]', 'float') AS RatedNumberSeats
		, @{pipeline().parameters.pBatchId} as batch_id

	--into FoodCourtStage
FROM PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingData rd
	INNER JOIN PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingHeader rh ON rd.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID
	OUTER APPLY rd.RatingDataXML.nodes('//NabersData/GeneralEnvelope/GeneralSinglePages/FoodCourtPage/FoodCourts/FoodCourt') ps(d)

	
WHERE rh.PremiseTypeID = 55 
and rh.RatingStatusID in (157,158)			--Certified Current/Expired
and rh.RatingHeaderId in (@{pipeline().parameters.pDeltaRatingHeaderIds})

	) as InnerQuery
	Where FoodCourtId is not null
order by RatingHeaderID, FoodCourtID

SELECT * from ( 
SELECT
       rh.RatingHeaderID
      
	   	,ps.d.value('(CinemaID)[1]', 'float') AS CinemaID
		,ps.d.value('CinemaDesc[1]', 'varchar(max)') AS CinemaDesc
		,ps.d.value('NumberTheatrettes[1]', 'float') AS NumberTheatrettes
		,ps.d.value('NumberOutOfSvcGT4Weeks[1]', 'float') AS NumberOutOfSvcGT4Weeks
		,ps.d.value('OutOfServiceWeeks[1]', 'float') AS OutOfServiceWeeks
		,ps.d.value('RatedNumberTheatrettes[1]', 'float') AS RatedNumberTheatrettes
		, @{pipeline().parameters.pBatchId} as batch_id

	--into CinemaStage
FROM PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingData rd
	INNER JOIN PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingHeader rh ON rd.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID
	OUTER APPLY rd.RatingDataXML.nodes('//NabersData/GeneralEnvelope/GeneralSinglePages/CinemaPage/Cinemas/Cinema') ps(d)

	
WHERE rh.PremiseTypeID = 55 
and rh.RatingStatusID in (157,158)			--Certified Current/Expired
and rh.RatingHeaderId in (@{pipeline().parameters.pDeltaRatingHeaderIds})
	) as InnerQuery
where cinemaId is not null

order by RatingHeaderID, CinemaID

Select * from (
SELECT
       rh.RatingHeaderID
      
	   	,ps.d.value('(@GymID)[1]', 'float') AS GymID
		,ps.d.value('GymDesc[1]', 'varchar(max)') AS GymDesc
		,ps.d.value('ConfirmedArea[1]', 'float') AS ConfirmedArea
		,ps.d.value('IsEstimate[1]', 'varchar(max)') AS IsEstimate
		,ps.d.value('IsCentralServicing[1]', 'varchar(max)') AS IsCentralServicing
		,ps.d.value('OutOfServiceWeeks[1]', 'float') AS OutOfServiceWeeks
		,ps.d.value('RatedGymArea[1]', 'float') AS RatedGymArea
		, @{pipeline().parameters.pBatchId} as batch_id

	--into FoodCourtStage
FROM PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingData rd
	INNER JOIN PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingHeader rh ON rd.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID
	OUTER APPLY rd.RatingDataXML.nodes('//NabersData/GeneralEnvelope/GeneralSinglePages/GymnasiumPage/Gymnasiums/Gymnasium') ps(d)

	
WHERE rh.PremiseTypeID = 55 
and rh.RatingStatusID in (157,158)			--Certified Current/Expired
and rh.RatingHeaderId in (@{pipeline().parameters.pDeltaRatingHeaderIds})
	) as InnerQuery
	Where GymId is not null
order by RatingHeaderID, GymID

Select newId() AS unique_meter_id, * from (
					SELECT rh.RatingHeaderID 
	   				,ep.d.value('UniqueAccountID[1]', 'float') AS UniqueAccountID
					,ep.d.value('Supplier[1]', 'varchar(50)') AS Supplier
					,ep.d.value('AccountNumber[1]', 'varchar(50)') AS AccountNumber
					,ep.d.value('Nmi[1]', 'varchar(50)') AS Nmi
					,rtrim(ltrim(ep.d.value('Coverage[1]', 'varchar(50)'))) AS Coverage
					,ep.d.value('Start12MonthBillPeriod[1]', 'datetime') AS Start12MonthBillPeriod
					,ep.d.value('End12MonthBillPeriod[1]', 'datetime') AS End12MonthBillPeriod
					,'Utility Inclusion' as MeterType
					,'Electricity'  as Utility
 					,ep.d.query('BillsTable[1]') AS BillsTable
					,ep.d.query('NonUtilMeterExclusionsTable[1]') as NonUtilMeterExclusionsTable
					, @{pipeline().parameters.pBatchId} as batch_id

				--into HoursOfServicesStage
			FROM PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingData rd
				INNER JOIN PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingHeader rh ON rd.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID
				OUTER APPLY rd.RatingDataXML.nodes('//NabersData/EnergyEnvelope/EnergyData/ElectricityPages/XmlElement/ElectricityPage') ep(d)

	
			WHERE rh.PremiseTypeID = 55 
			and rh.RatingStatusID in (157,158)			--Certified Current/Expired
			and rh.RatingHeaderId in (@{pipeline().parameters.pDeltaRatingHeaderIds})
			

Union ALL
-- No water found in Shopping centre.
Select * from (
					SELECT rh.RatingHeaderID 
	   				,ep.d.value('UniqueAccountID[1]', 'float') AS UniqueAccountID
					,ep.d.value('Supplier[1]', 'varchar(50)') AS Supplier
					,ep.d.value('AccountNumber[1]', 'varchar(50)') AS AccountNumber
					,'' AS Nmi
					,rtrim(ltrim(ep.d.value('Coverage[1]', 'varchar(50)'))) AS Coverage
					,ep.d.value('Start12MonthBillPeriod[1]', 'datetime') AS Start12MonthBillPeriod
					,ep.d.value('End12MonthBillPeriod[1]', 'datetime') AS End12MonthBillPeriod
					,'Utility Inclusion' as MeterType
					,'Water'  as Utility
 					,ep.d.query('BillsTable[1]') AS BillsTable
					,ep.d.query('NonUtilMeterExclusionsTable[1]') as NonUtilMeterExclusionsTable
					, @{pipeline().parameters.pBatchId} as batch_id
			FROM PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingData rd
				INNER JOIN PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingHeader rh ON rd.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID
				OUTER APPLY rd.RatingDataXML.nodes('//NabersData/EnergyEnvelope/WaterData/WaterPages/XmlElement/WaterPage') ep(d)

	
			WHERE rh.PremiseTypeID = 55 
			and rh.RatingStatusID in (157,158)			--Certified Current/Expired
			and rh.RatingHeaderId in (@{pipeline().parameters.pDeltaRatingHeaderIds})
			
	) as InnerQuery
	Where BillsTable is not null and NonUtilMeterExclusionsTable is not null

Union ALL
-- Gas
Select * from (

					SELECT rh.RatingHeaderID 
	   				,ep.d.value('UniqueAccountID[1]', 'float') AS UniqueAccountID
					,ep.d.value('Supplier[1]', 'varchar(50)') AS Supplier
					,ep.d.value('AccountNumber[1]', 'varchar(50)') AS AccountNumber	
					,'' as Nmi
					,rtrim(ltrim(ep.d.value('Coverage[1]', 'varchar(50)'))) AS Coverage
					,ep.d.value('Start12MonthBillPeriod[1]', 'datetime') AS Start12MonthBillPeriod
					,ep.d.value('End12MonthBillPeriod[1]', 'datetime') AS End12MonthBillPeriod
					,'Utility Inclusion' as MeterType
					,'Gas' as Utility
					,ep.d.query('BillsTable[1]') AS BillsTable
					,ep.d.query('NonUtilMeterExclusionsTable[1]') as NonUtilMeterExclusionsTable
					, @{pipeline().parameters.pBatchId} as batch_id


			FROM PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingData rd
				INNER JOIN PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingHeader rh ON rd.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID
				OUTER APPLY rd.RatingDataXML.nodes('//NabersData/EnergyEnvelope/EnergyData/GasPages/XmlElement/GasPage') ep(d)

	
			WHERE rh.PremiseTypeID = 55 
			and rh.RatingStatusID in (157,158)			--Certified Current/Expired
			and rh.RatingHeaderId in (@{pipeline().parameters.pDeltaRatingHeaderIds})
	) as InnerQuery
	Where BillsTable is not null and NonUtilMeterExclusionsTable is not null
			
union all
--'Electricity Non Utility Inclusion'
Select * from (
		SELECT rh.RatingHeaderID 
			,'' UniqueAccountID
			,''Supplier
			,''AccountNumber
			,''Nmi
			, ''Coverage
			,ep.d.value('StartOfRatingPeriod[1]', 'datetime') AS Start12MonthBillPeriod
			,ep.d.value('EndOfRatingPeriod[1]', 'datetime') AS End12MonthBillPeriod
			,'Non Utility Inclusion' as MeterType
			,'Electricity'  as Utility
 			,ep.d.query('ElecInclusionsTable[1]') AS BillsTable
			,es.d.query('ElectricityMetersTable[1]') as NonUtilMeterExclusionsTable
			, @{pipeline().parameters.pBatchId} as batch_id


	FROM PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingData rd
		INNER JOIN PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingHeader rh ON rd.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID
		OUTER APPLY rd.RatingDataXML.nodes('//NabersData/EnergyEnvelope/EnergyData/SinglePagesHolder/EnergySinglePages/NonUtilMeterInclusionPage') ep(d)
		OUTER APPLY rd.RatingDataXML.nodes('//NabersData/EnergyEnvelope/EnergyData/SinglePagesHolder/EnergySinglePages/NonUtilMeterValidationPage') es(d)
	
	WHERE rh.PremiseTypeID = 55 
	and rh.RatingStatusID in (157,158)			--Certified Current/Expired
	and rh.RatingHeaderId in (@{pipeline().parameters.pDeltaRatingHeaderIds})
	
	) as InnerQuery
	Where BillsTable is not null and NonUtilMeterExclusionsTable is not null

UNION ALL 
-- 'Gas Non Utility Inclusion'
Select * from (
	SELECT rh.RatingHeaderID 
			,'' UniqueAccountID
			,''Supplier
			,''AccountNumber
			,''Nmi
			, ''Coverage
			,ep.d.value('StartOfRatingPeriod[1]', 'datetime') AS Start12MonthBillPeriod
			,ep.d.value('EndOfRatingPeriod[1]', 'datetime') AS End12MonthBillPeriod
			,'Non Utility Inclusion' as MeterType
			,'Gas'  as Utility
 			,ep.d.query('GasInclusionsTable[1]') AS BillsTable
			,es.d.query('GasMetersTable[1]') as NonUtilMeterExclusionsTable
			, @{pipeline().parameters.pBatchId} as batch_id


	FROM PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingData rd
		INNER JOIN PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingHeader rh ON rd.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID
		OUTER APPLY rd.RatingDataXML.nodes('//NabersData/EnergyEnvelope/EnergyData/SinglePagesHolder/EnergySinglePages/NonUtilMeterInclusionPage') ep(d)
		OUTER APPLY rd.RatingDataXML.nodes('//NabersData/EnergyEnvelope/EnergyData/SinglePagesHolder/NonUtilMeterValidationPage') es(d)
	
	WHERE rh.PremiseTypeID = 55 
	and rh.RatingStatusID in (157,158)			--Certified Current/Expired
	
	and rh.RatingHeaderId in (@{pipeline().parameters.pDeltaRatingHeaderIds})
	) as InnerQuery
	Where BillsTable is not null and NonUtilMeterExclusionsTable is not null

UNION ALL

--'Water Non Utility Inclusion'
Select * from (
SELECT rh.RatingHeaderID 
			,'' UniqueAccountID
			,''Supplier
			,''AccountNumber
			,''Nmi
			, ''Coverage
			,ep.d.value('StartOfRatingPeriod[1]', 'datetime') AS Start12MonthBillPeriod
			,ep.d.value('EndOfRatingPeriod[1]', 'datetime') AS End12MonthBillPeriod
			,'Non Utility Inclusion' as MeterType
			,'Water'  as Utility
 			,ep.d.query('InclusionsTable[1]') AS BillsTable
			,es.d.query('WaterMetersTable[1]') as NonUtilMeterExclusionsTable
			, @{pipeline().parameters.pBatchId} as batch_id


	FROM PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingData rd
		INNER JOIN PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingHeader rh ON rd.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID
		OUTER APPLY rd.RatingDataXML.nodes('//NabersData/EnergyEnvelope/EnergyData/SinglePagesHolder/WaterSinglePages/NonUtilMeterInclusionPage') ep(d)
		OUTER APPLY rd.RatingDataXML.nodes('//NabersData/EnergyEnvelope/EnergyData/SinglePagesHolder/NonUtilMeterValidationPage') es(d)
	
	WHERE rh.PremiseTypeID = 55 
	and rh.RatingStatusID in (157,158)			--Certified Current/Expired
	and rh.RatingHeaderId in (@{pipeline().parameters.pDeltaRatingHeaderIds})
	
	) as InnerQuery
	Where UniqueAccountID is not null and Start12MonthBillPeriod is not null

Union ALL

Select * from (
SELECT rh.RatingHeaderID 
			,'' UniqueAccountID
			,''Supplier
			,''AccountNumber
			,''Nmi
			, ''Coverage
			, '' AS Start12MonthBillPeriod
			,'' AS End12MonthBillPeriod
			,'Small End Use Inclusion' as MeterType
			,'Electricity'  as Utility
 			,ep.d.query('InclusionsTable[1]') AS BillsTable
			,'' as NonUtilMeterExclusionsTable
			, @{pipeline().parameters.pBatchId} as batch_id


	FROM PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingData rd
		INNER JOIN PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingHeader rh ON rd.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID
		OUTER APPLY rd.RatingDataXML.nodes('//NabersData/EnergyEnvelope/EnergyData/SinglePagesHolder/EnergySinglePages/SmallEndUseInclusionPage') ep(d)
	
	WHERE rh.PremiseTypeID = 55 
	and rh.RatingStatusID in (157,158)			--Certified Current/Expired
	and rh.RatingHeaderId in (@{pipeline().parameters.pDeltaRatingHeaderIds})
		) as InnerQuery
	Where BillsTable is not null and NonUtilMeterExclusionsTable is not null


UNION All

Select * from (
SELECT rh.RatingHeaderID 
			, ep.d.value('UniqueAccountID[1]', 'varchar(15)')  as UniqueAccountID
			,'' Supplier
			, '' as AccountNumber
			,'' Nmi
			, '' as Coverage
			, '' AS Start12MonthBillPeriod
			,'' AS End12MonthBillPeriod
			, case when ep.d.value('(AdjustmentType/@Value)[1]', 'varchar(15)') = 'EXCLDE' then 'Standard Thermal Inclusion' else 'Standard Thermal Exclusion' end as MeterType
			,ep.d.value('(ExclusionTargetAccountOrMeter/UtilityType)[1]', 'varchar(15)')  as Utility
 			,ep.d.query('ExclusionTargetAccountOrMeter[1]') AS BillsTable
			,'' as NonUtilMeterExclusionsTable
			, @{pipeline().parameters.pBatchId} as batch_id
			


	FROM PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingData rd
		INNER JOIN PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingHeader rh ON rd.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID
		OUTER APPLY rd.RatingDataXML.nodes('//NabersData/EnergyEnvelope/EnergyData/ThermalTranStdPages/XmlElement/StandardThermalTransferPage') ep(d)
	
	WHERE rh.PremiseTypeID = 55 
	and rh.RatingStatusID in (157,158)			--Certified Current/Expired
	and rh.RatingHeaderId in (@{pipeline().parameters.pDeltaRatingHeaderIds})
	) as InnerQuery
	Where UniqueAccountID is not null 


UNION ALL

Select * from (
SELECT rh.RatingHeaderID 
			, ep.d.value('UniqueAccountID[1]', 'varchar(15)')  as UniqueAccountID
			,'' Supplier
			, '' as AccountNumber
			,'' Nmi
			, '' as Coverage
			, '' AS Start12MonthBillPeriod
			,'' AS End12MonthBillPeriod
			, 'Financial Reconciliation Exclusion'as MeterType
			,ep.d.value('(UtilityAccount/UtilityType)[1]', 'varchar(15)')  as Utility
 			,ep.d.query('UtilityAccount[1]') AS BillsTable
			,ep.d.query('FinRecSummary[1]') as NonUtilMeterExclusionsTable
			, @{pipeline().parameters.pBatchId} as batch_id
			


	FROM PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingData rd
		INNER JOIN PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingHeader rh ON rd.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID
		OUTER APPLY rd.RatingDataXML.nodes('//NabersData/EnergyEnvelope/EnergyData/FinRecPages/XmlElement/FinRecExclusionPage') ep(d)
	
	WHERE rh.PremiseTypeID = 55 
	and rh.RatingStatusID in (157,158)			--Certified Current/Expired
	
	
	) as InnerQuery
	Where UniqueAccountID is not null 

UNION ALL

Select * from (
SELECT rh.RatingHeaderID 
			, ep.d.value('UniqueAccountID[1]', 'varchar(15)')  as UniqueAccountID
			,'' Supplier
			, '' as AccountNumber
			,'' Nmi
			, ep.d.value('Coverage[1]', 'varchar(15)') as Coverage
			, '' AS Start12MonthBillPeriod
			,'' AS End12MonthBillPeriod
			, 'Diesel Tank'as MeterType
			, 'Diesel'  as Utility
 			,ep.d.query('BillsTable[1]') AS BillsTable
			,ep.d.query('DieselSummary[1]') as NonUtilMeterExclusionsTable
			, @{pipeline().parameters.pBatchId} as batch_id
			
	FROM PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingData rd
		INNER JOIN PVBMSDB4202.NABERSDB.dbo.tblRatingHeader rh ON rd.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID
		OUTER APPLY rd.RatingDataXML.nodes('//NabersData/EnergyEnvelope/EnergyData/DieselPages/XmlElement/DieselPage') ep(d)
	
	WHERE rh.PremiseTypeID = 55 
	and rh.RatingStatusID in (157,158)			--Certified Current/Expired
	
	
	) as InnerQuery
	Where UniqueAccountID is not null 
) as InnerQuery
Order by ratingheaderid, Utility, UniqueAccountID, MeterType, Start12MonthBillPeriod
